**Is this a hole in the FaQ or the KBEC license?**
FaQ  /  License

**Do you think this is worthy of a new KBEC license release?**
Yes  /  No

**What is the issue?**
Example: A phrase in the FaQ doesn't match what the license says

**Why do you think this is worth fixing?**
This should be three sentences long or more.
